data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Lörz, Anne-Nina, Coleman, Charles Oliver (2014): Amazing new Amphipoda (Crustacea, Epimeriidae) from New Zealand’s deep-sea. Zootaxa 3838 (4): 423-434, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3838.4.2
